comments:
steps to reproduce

* start new workspace
* configure basic runtime
* create dynamic web project "war" and choose to add it to "warEAR" enterprise app
* right-click on "warEAR" project, Properties, ear modules, "Add Variable..." to
add JUNIT_HOME/junit.jar. OK.
* right-click on "war" project, Properties, J2EE Modules.

Problem: error message pops up and the following exception is written to .log

tested with WTP I200511162235
*** Bug 117091 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

By the way, I think the serverity should at least be major since it can cause 
failure of WAR Export and possibly other functions.

Created an attachment (id=30856)
One line change to use component name instead of project name.

In case it helps including this in 10M10.  Thanks.
This fix is released for the RC1 candidate driver.
